template.name: RecyclerViewTemplate
template.description: Creates a new Activity or Fragment with custom RecyclerView Adapter.

parameter.name: Need Fragment code instead of Activitiy?
parameter.help: If true, the fragment code will be created instead of Activity

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: Fragment Class Name
parameter.help: The name of the fragment class to create

parameter.name: Fragment Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create

parameter.name: Include fragment factory methods?
parameter.help: Generate static fragment factory methods for easy instantiation

parameter.name: Include interface callbacks?
parameter.help: Generate event callbacks for communication with an Activity or other fragments

parameter.name: Title
parameter.help: The name of the activity. For launcher activities, the application title.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Need Toolbar
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a Toolbar

parameter.name: Need Search in Toolbar
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a Toolbar with Search

parameter.name: Need FAB with RecyclerView
parameter.help: If true, the recyclerview will have a fab with scroll collapse and expand behaviour

parameter.name: Need CardView with RecyclerView
parameter.help: If true, the recyclerview will have a CardView as a item layout

parameter.name: Adapter Name
parameter.help: The name of the adapter class to create

parameter.name: Adapter Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the row layout to use

parameter.name: LayoutManager Type
parameter.help: Choose your own LayoutManager Type

parameter.name: Adapter Google play Name
parameter.help: The name of the google play adapter class to create

parameter.name: Model Name
parameter.help: The name of the model class for adapter

parameter.name: RecyclerView Style
parameter.help: Choose your own RecyclerView style

parameter.name: Add Header
parameter.help: If true, recyclerview list item will have a header

parameter.name: Add Footer
parameter.help: If true, recyclerview list item will have a footer

parameter.name: Need ItemClick
parameter.help: If true, recyclerview list item will be clickable

parameter.name: Need SwipeRefreshLayout
parameter.help: If true, swipe refresh layout will be enabled

parameter.name: Need Divider
parameter.help: If true, divider layout will be shown

parameter.name: Need Pagination
parameter.help: If true, pagination will be enabled for RecyclerView

parameter.name: Item Name
parameter.help: The name of the ViewHolder class to create

parameter.name: Item Layout Header Name
parameter.help: The name of the row layout to use

parameter.name: Item Layout Footer Name
parameter.help: The name of the row layout to use

parameter.name: Item Layout Google Play
parameter.help: The name of the Google play row layout to use

parameter.name: Item Layout for single card Google Play
parameter.help: The name of the Google play single row layout to use
